Adam Ludwin is a Principal at RRE Ventures. Mr. Ludwin focuses on early and expansion stage investments across RREâ€™s multiple technology verticals, with a focus on consumer & digital media, financial technology and mobile opportunities.

Prior to joining RRE, Mr. Ludwin worked at the design and innovation firm IDEO as a member of the business design team. At IDEO he led a team of engineers as an entrepreneur-in-residence to incubate a collaboration software start-up. Mr. Ludwin began his career at The Boston Consulting Group in New York, where he served clients in the technology, consumer, and financial services industries, and worked closely with the firmâ€™s Strategy Institute.

In addition, Mr. Ludwin is a two-time entrepreneur, having built and sold a social shopping platform and later a discussion system for securities trading desks.

Mr. Ludwin holds an MBA from Harvard Business School, where he was a Baker Scholar and a Ford Scholar, and a BS from the University of California, Berkeley, where he graduated with Highest Honors.
